I'll be fine tomorrow

topics.body:
I have a random ass question: Do you think that let's players (the people that record themselves playing games) as a *INDUSTRY* is dying?

Not a long number of years ago there was all that craze about letsplayers and that with tons of people having it as jobs, but it seems to have teetered out.


If I had to take a complete swing in the dark every popular game in existence that has already come out has been done to fucking death.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
